success.arenaRenamed: &aDisplay name of arena &e{arena} &ahas been changed into &d{arena_displayname}

error.notPlayer: &cYou must be a player to use this command!
error.noPermission: &cYou do not have permission to perform this command!
error.teamNotRegistered: &cTeam {team} &cis not registered in arena &e{arena}&c. Add the team in &e/spleef arena settings {arena}&c.
error.notInArena: &cYou must be in an arena to leave!
error.disallowedCommand: &cYou may not execute this command while in-game!
error.noAvailableArena: &cI couldn't find an available arena for you
error.noPermissionStats: &cYou don't have permission to view statistics of other players!

arena.arenaNeedsSetup: &cThis arena is not in a playable state.
arena.arenaAlreadyExists: &cAn arena with the key &e{arena} &calready exists! Remove it with &e/spleef arena remove {arena}&c.
arena.notEnoughPlayers: &eThere are not enough players to start the game. Countdown cancelled.
arena.gameStarting: &aThere are enough players to start the game. Starting in &e{countdown} second{plural}&a.
arena.serverStopped: &cThe server has stopped, so the game has been forcibly ended.

economy.boosterGiven: &aYou have been given a booster of type &e{booster_type_displayname}
economy.cannotActivateMoreBoosters: &cYou have reached the maximum amount of boosters activated!
economy.notEnoughCoins: &cYou do not have enough coins to purchase this item!

splegg_upgrades.notEnoughCoinsSplegg: &cYou do not have enough coins to purchase this upgrade!
splegg_upgrades.mustPurchaseBefore: &cYou must purchase previous abilities before buying this!
